price: 21. Dan (kemenangan-kemenangan) atas negeri-negeri lain yang belum kamu kuasai, tetapi sesungguhnya Allah telah menentukannya. Dan Allah Mahakuasa atas segala sesuatu.
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهَا قَدۡ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā lam taqdirū ʿalayhā qad aḥāṭa al-lahu bihā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
